tools.name: Image File Converter
tools.description: Converts an image from one format to another and saves it to the 'converted' directory.

tools.name: convert_image
tools.description:
Takes in an image path and and a target format. 
    Converts the image from the image path to target format and saves it to the 'converted' directory.
    Returns the relative path to the converted image.

Image File Converter.case_name: Basic Image Conversion from JPG to PNG
Image File Converter.purpose: 验证工具能否将JPG图像文件正确转换为PNG格式并保存到指定目录
